dct_title_s: Critical raw materials deposits in mainland Portugal: /
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Depths shown by bathymetric tints and contour lines. Includes text, legends, and charts 2nd sheet includes index titled "Critical raw materials by deposits by district". "Based on COM (2020) 474 final (3/09/2020) Communication from the commission to the European parliament, the council, the European economic and social committee of the regions" Lower right-hand corner: "Database Date -2020. No CRM data on Açores and Madeira Islands"
dct_creator_sm: Laboratório Nacional de Energia e Geologia,.
